title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen, welcome back!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, it's so good to see you.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You too, buddy.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, man. You ain't gonna believe the things I got planned for us.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You ready to have some serious fun?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, actually I've got something to show you first.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wow. I can't believe they renamed the Piston Cup after our very own Doc Hudson.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I know Doc said these things were just old cups, but to have someone else win it just didn't feel right, you know?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, Doc would've been real proud of you. That's for sure.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Alright, pal. I've been waiting all summer for this. What've you got planned?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You sure you can handle it?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Come on, you know who you're talking to? This is Lightning McQueen. I can handle anything.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Uh.... Mater?!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Just remember, your brakes ain't gonna work on these!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Relax, these train tracks ain't been used in years!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Come on, come on! Faster, faster!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: This is gonna be good!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Uh-oh. This ain't gonna be good.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Boy, this was the best day ever! And my favorite souvenir?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: This new dent!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Boy, Mater. Today was, uh...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Shoot, that was nothing. Wait til you see what I got planned for tonight.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, Mater. Whoa. I was kind of thinking of just a quiet dinner.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's exactly what I was thinking.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, I... I meant with Sally, Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Even better! You, me and Miss Sally going out for supper.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, I meant it would be just me and Sally.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It's just for tonight. We'll do whatever you want tomorrow.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Okay.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Thanks for understanding.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah, sure. Y'all go on and have fun now.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Alright, then. See ya soon, amigo!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I can't tell you how good it is to be here alone. Just the two of us. Finally, you and me ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Good evening.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: My name is Mater and I'll be your waiter. Mater the waiter. That's funny right there.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, you work here?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well yeah I work here. What'd you think, I just snuck in here when nobody was looking and pretended to be your waiter, just so I could hang out with you?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, yeah. How ridiculous would that be?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Now, can I start you two lovebirds off with a couple drinks?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yes. I'll have my usual.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Uh, right. Your usual. CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Guido! What's McQueen's usual?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Perfect! Give me two of `em.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What happened to the dinosaurs, now?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, what's going on over there? CUT BACK TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, it's that Italian Formula car. His name is ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wait, why do you know his name? And don't say it like that. It's three syllables, not ten.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What's wrong with fenders? I thought you like my fenders.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Ha ha! That shows what you know. Dump trucks is dumb.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah, hi, this is Lightning McQueen. Look, I don't appreciate my best friend being insulted like that.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Those are strong words from a car that is so fragile.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: "Not so fast." What is that, your new motto?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, I would love to. The only thing is my crew's off for the season so ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You know what? They just got back. Deal me in, baby. Ka-chow!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I know, I know. I just got back. But we won't be long and ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Your drinks, sir.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I didn't taste it!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: How'd you like to come and see the world with me?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You mean it?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You got me into this thing. You're coming along.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, look at this. Okay now Mater, remember: best behavior.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You got it, buddy. Hey, what's that?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, Jeff. Lewis! CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey! You done good! You got all the leaves!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Will you guys excuse me just for one little second?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, listen. This isn't Radiator Springs.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You're just realizing that? Boy, that jet-lag really done a number on you.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, look -- things are different over here. Which means maybe you should, you know, act a little different too.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Different than what?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, just... help me out here, buddy. I ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You need help? Shoot, why didn't you just say so? That's what a tow truck does. Hey, looky there, it's Mr. San Francisco!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'll introduce you.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, no.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Look at me -- I'm helping you already!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey Mr. San Francisco, I'd like you to meet ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Nice to meet you, Francesco.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Excuse me. Can I get a picture with you?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Miss Sally is gonna flip when she sees this. She's Lightning McQueen's girlfriend.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: She's a big fan of yours.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater's prone to exaggeration. I wouldn't say she's a "big" fan.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You're right. She's a huge fan. She goes on and on about your open wheels here.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mentioning it once doesn't qualify as going "on and on."

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah, uh...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Let's.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, sorry. I already dedicated MY win tomorrow to her. So if we both do it, it's really not so special. Besides, I don't have a drink.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'll go get you one. You mind if I borrow a few bucks for one of them drinks?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: They're free, Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Free? Well, shoot, what am I doing here?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I should probably go keep an eye on him. See you at the race.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's cute. So you had one of those made up for all the racers?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Okay.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: He is so getting beat tomorrow.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: A Volkswagen Karmann Ghia has no radiator.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's because it's air-cooled.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'm Agent Shiftwell, Holley Shiftwell from the Tokyo Station. I have a message from London.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Not here. You must try the canapes on the mezzanine!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: So the lab boys analyzed the photo I sent? What did they learn about the camera?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It appears to be a standard television camera. They said if you could get closer photos next time, that would be great.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: This was London's message?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh -- no, no. No sir. Um, the oil platforms you were on? Turns out they're sitting on the biggest oil reserve in the world.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: How did we miss that?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: They'd been scrambling everyone's satellites. The Americans actually discovered it just before you did. They placed an agent on that platform, under deep cover. He was able to get a photo of the car who's running the entire operation.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Who is it? Has anyone seen the photo yet?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, not yet. The American is here tonight to pass it to you. He'll signal you when he's ready.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: GOOD ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh no.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What is it?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Change of plan. You're meeting the American.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What, me?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Those thugs down there were on the oil platform. If they see me, the whole mission is compromised.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, no. I'm technical, you see. I'm in Diagnostics. I'm not a field agent.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You are now. CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'll take one of them.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Never know which one McQueen'll have a hankering for.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, what you got here that's free? How about that pistachio ice cream?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, same ol', same ol'. What's up with you? That looks delicious.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Uh, a little more, please. It is free, right? Keep it coming. A little more. Come on, let's go, it's free! You're getting there... Scoop scoop!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: There you go. Now THAT's a scoop of ice cream.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Thank you so much for having us, Sir Axlerod. I really look forward to racing. This is a great opportunity.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Somebody get me water!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Sweet relief...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Whatever you do, do not eat the free pistachio ice cream. It has turned!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Sir Axlerod, I can explain. This is Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, thank you. This trip's been amazing.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: But wait, I... oh, shoot.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, you have to get a hold of yourself. You're making a scene.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: But I never leak oil. Never.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Go take care of yourself right now.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Coming through! Excuse me, leakin' oil. Where's the bathroom? Thank you. I gotta go!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What the...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Sorry ladies!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I never leak I never leak I never leak...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wowee...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What in the---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, that tickles.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: The American has activated his tracking beacon.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Roger that. Move in.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, you've got to be joking.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What's the problem, Shiftwell?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: He's in the loo.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: So go in!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I can't just go into the men's loo.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Time is of the essence, Shiftwell.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Whatever you do, I would not go in there.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: A Gremlin and a Pacer!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No offense to your makes and models, but you guys break down harder than my cousin Betsy after she got left at the ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: --- altar!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Are you okay?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, yeah. Don't let me get in the way of your "private business." Oh! A little advice: When you hear her giggle and see that waterfall, you best press that green button.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It's to adjust the temperature.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Remember it's in Celsius, not Fahrenheit.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Alright then.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Excuse me, ma'am.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Dadgum pistachio ice cream.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: This cannot be him.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Is he American?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Look out, ladies. Mater's fittin' to get funky!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Extremely.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Then it's him.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hello.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, hello.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: A Volkswagen Karmann Ghia has no radiator.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well of course it doesn't. That's `cause it's air-cooled!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Perfect. I'm from the Tokyo Station OF THE---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Course, Karmann Ghia's weren't the only ones. Besides the Beetles you had your Type-3 Squarebacks, with the pancake motors...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah. Okay, I get it---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: ... And before both of them, there's the Type-2 buses - my buddy Fillmore's one of them.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Listen! We should find somewhere more private.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Uh, gee. Don't you think that's a little, uh ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You're right. Impossible to know which areas here are compromised. So, when can I see you again?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, let's see. Tomorrow I'll be out there at the races.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Got it. We'll rendezvous then.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: There you are. Where have you been?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What's a rendezvous?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: A date?!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, what's going on?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, what's going on is I've got me a date tomorrow.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, believe it. My new girlfriend just said so. Hey, there she is.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey! Hey lady!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: See ya tomorrow!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Speed. I am speed.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: He is so getting beat today.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: And he's awesome! CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Why is he in the pits? He's so exposed.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It's his cover. One of the best I've seen, too. Look at the detail on that rust. It must have cost him a fortune.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: But why hasn't he contacted us yet?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: There's probably heat on him. Be patient.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Right, of course. He'll signal us when he can.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: And then we find out who's behind all this.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen! It's time to make your move. Get on the outside and show 'em what Doc done taught you.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Ten four, Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Nice call, Mater. Keep it up!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hold on. I think I've got something.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What is it?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: The Pacer from the party last night.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Cross-referencing with the photos from the oil derricks... Yep. His VIN numbers match.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Anyone with him? He won't be alone.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Conducting analysis on the target.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: He's not the only one here. Three... five... they're everywhere. And they're all closing in on... oh no.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Finn? Finn, where are you?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Get him out of the pits now!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wow! Some of them fellers is really loud.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Can you hear me? Over.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Uh, what?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Get out of the pit now. Do you hear me?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, I know you. You're that girl from the party last night. You wanna do our date right now?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Guys, a little too much chatter. Let's keep this line clear.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: There's no time for messing about. You've got to get out of the pits.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Is there gonna be cable where you is so I can watch the rest of the race?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You're running out of time!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: They're coming, Shiftwell.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yes, I know.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Get him out of there.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'm trying. Get out now!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, all right but I usually like to have a proper detailing done before I meet a lady friend.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Then this shouldn't hurt at all.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Miss Shiftwell?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I've got him in the back alleys east of the garages. Multiple assailants are closing in quickly.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Keep him moving. I'm on my way.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, new lady friend? You like flowers?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No! Don't go 'in' anywhere. Just keep moving.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Stay outside. Gotcha.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Outside?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You're doing brilliantly. Now just stay focused.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What's that? You want me to head toward that ruckus?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No! Don't go down that street!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wow! A live karate demonstration!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Stop it, Mater. Just sign off.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That was cool! Hey, can I get your autograph?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, where'd he go?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Our rendezvous has been jeopardized. Keep the device safe. We'll be in touch.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Dadgum, did I miss our date?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey McQueen! What happened? Is the race over? You won, right?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, why were you yelling things at me while I was racing?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yelling? Oh, you thought... that's funny right there. Nah, see that's `cause I seen these two fellers doing some sort of karate street performance. It was nutso. One of them even had a flamethrower ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: A flamethrower? What are you talking about? I don't understand. Where were you?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Going to meet my date.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Your date?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: She started talking to me as a voice in my head, telling me where to go ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wait a minute -- I didn't screw you up, did I?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I lost the race because of you!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, I'm sorry. I didn't mean ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: An imaginary girlfriend, flamethrowers. This is exactly why I don't bring you along to these things.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Maybe if I, I don't know, talked to somebody and explained what happened I could help.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I don't need your help. I don't want your help.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I made a mistake. But I can assure you, it won't happen again.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Look, guys. We know what the problem is and we've taken care of it. SMASH TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: But I'm gonna miss my plane.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Doggone it. This is about my hook, isn't it? I know I should've checked it, but I can't really, look -- it's attached to me.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, I know you. You're that feller from the karate demonstration.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I never properly introduced myself. Finn McMissile. British Intelligence.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Tow Mater. Average intelligence.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Who are you with? FBI, CIA?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Let's just say I'm triple-A affiliated. You know, I know some karate. I don't wanna brag or nothing, but I've got me a black fan belt.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, you wanna see some moves I made up?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You're being followed.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: This first one I can reach into a car's hood, pull out his battery, and show it to him before he stalls. I call it, "What I accidentally did to my friend Luigi once."

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Look, I probably ought to go. I'm about to miss my flight.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Don't worry.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I've taken care of that. Hang on.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: This is First Class service. You don't even have to go through the terminal.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Your karate partners are back here. They kinda look like they're trying to catch up!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Drive forward. Whatever you do, don't stop.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Is everything okay back there?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Roger that.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You remember that whole thing about me not stopping no matter what?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I knew I should've done carry-on!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Thanks, old boy!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, doggone it. It's my imaginary girlfriend!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Come on! Get in here!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Boy I tell you what, you really do want this first date, don't ya? That's a no-quit attitude right there.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hold on, Sid!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: By the time you read this, I will be safely on an airplane, flying home.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: "I'm so sorry for what I did. I don't want to be the cause of you losing any more races. I want you to go prove to the world what I already know - that you are the greatest race car in the whole wide world. Your best friend, Mater."

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I didn't really want him to leave.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, at least I know if he's at home he'll be safe.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Now that's how I like to start the day! You never feel more alive than when you're almost dead.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I hope that device didn't fall off.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's the closest I ever been to missing my flight! That was ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yow!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Still in one piece, great.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I gotta go to a doctor. I keep getting these sharp pains in my undercarriage.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Downloading the photo now.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, lemme introduce you two. This here is Finn McSomething-or- other. He's a First Class VIP airport whatchamacallit. And Finn, this here's my date. I never did get your name.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh yes, sorry. It's Shiftwell. Holley Shiftwell.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It's Shiftwell. Holley ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Finally. Time to see who's behind all this.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What is this?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, that's one of the worst engines ever made. It's an old aluminum V8 with a Lucas electrical system and Whitworth bolts. Shoot, them Whitworth bolts is a pain, tell you what. Them ain't metric, they ain't inches...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yes, OK, right. But who's engine is this, Mater?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, it's kinda hard to tell from this picture, ain't it?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: But you're the one who took it.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Holley.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, right. Yes, of course. "A good agent gets what he can, then gets out before he's killed." Sorry.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Agent? You mean like insurance agent, like, `Like a good neighbor, Mater is there'? Wait, you mean secret agents. You guys is spies!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Holley, in how many makes and models did this type of engine appear?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It was standard in seven models over a 12-year period. At least 35,000 cars were made with this engine.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You're pretty.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yes, alright. Thank you.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: And so nice.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Just pay attention.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: This seems like a dead end. If there were something in the photo that could narrow this down a bit I'd be a lot happier.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You might not be happy, but I bet this feller is. See how he's had most of his parts replaced? And see all them boxes over there? Them's all original parts. They ain't easy to come by.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Rare parts.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's something we can track.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Exactly!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well done, Mater! I would never have seen that. I know of a black-market parts dealer in Paris, a treacherous lowlife. But, he's the only car in the world who can tell us whose engine this is. Mater, what would you say to setting up an informal task force on this one?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wait, what?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You obviously have plenty of experience in the field.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well yeah I live right next to one. I don't know, Finn. I ain't exactly been much help to anybody recently.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You're helping me. Please, Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, okay. But you know I'm just a tow truck, right?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Right. And I'm just in the import/export business. Siddeley?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Paris. Tout de suite.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah, two of them sweets for me too, Sid! You know, I always wanted to be a spy.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Really? Me too.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Is there any other way?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Once we're inside, stay close. Don't bother checking VIN numbers for criminal records, they're all dodgy here.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No VIN scans. Got it.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Don't talk to anyone. Don't look at anyone. And absolutely, positively no idling. Are we clear?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yes, right. No idling. Yes, sir.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah, Finn?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: We're not here to go shopping.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Shopping? What do you mean? Why would I ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Dadgum.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You gotta be kidding me - they've got everything here. Look at them hoods! I could use a hood.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Sorry fellers, I gotta go.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Excuse me. What are you selling?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: There you are.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Man, there are some great ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, get back!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, wait for me!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Have you lost your mind?!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: But I thought ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater! This chap needs a tow. Hook him up.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Sure thing. CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Allez! Maintenant - vite!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Easy, Tomber. This is her first field assignment - she didn't know you were my informant.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Informant?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Tomber was doing 20 to life in a Moroccan impound the first time I saved him, if I recall correctly.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Alright, we get it. You both know each other, you're both old. So.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: There you go, informant. Inform us.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Do those parts look familiar, Tomber?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: To whom?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, a lemon needs parts. Ain't nothing truer than that.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: "Lemon?"

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah, you know. Cars that don't ever work right. Lemons is a tow truck's bread and butter. Like them Gremlins and Pacers we run into at the party and the race and the airport.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Holley, pull up the pictures from the oil platform. I want to know what other type of cars were out there.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Right. Let's see. There were Hugos. And Trunkovs.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, are these cars considered lemons?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Is the Popemobile Catholic?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Finn. Everyone involved in this plot is one of history's biggest loser cars.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: And they're all taking their orders from the car behind this engine.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What, Tomber?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Where's this meeting taking place?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's where the next race is!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Then there's a good chance our mystery engine will be there too.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Holley, contact Stephenson and have him meet us at Gare de Lyon. Good work.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Boy, I'll tell you what. That three- wheeled feller had to be right about a big meeting.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You never see this many lemons in one town. Unless there's a swap meet, or something.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, how'd you get all them pictures?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, I remotely reprogrammed Porto Corsa's red light cameras to do recognition scans.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wow, not only is you the prettiest car I ever met, but you the smartest too.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Thank you. I think.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's a familiar sight.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: A Hugo being towed. But he looks absolutely perfect.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Of course. They must be the heads of the lemon families.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Makes sense. If I was rich and broke down every day, I'd hire me to tow me around all the time too.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: We've got to infiltrate that meeting. It's the only way to find out who's behind all this.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hang on a minute.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hold still.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Ahh!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Good job, Miss Shiftwell.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Thank you, Finn.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Boy, I sure wish my friends could see me now.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, Mama Topolino, please. You don't need to make a fuss!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: How'd you know that?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I brought my friend Mater along on the trip. And I told him he needed to act different, that we weren't in Radiator Springs.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: He's my best friend.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What did I do? I said some things during our fight...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What does that mean?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Thank you, Stephenson.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That should just about do it.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Perfect.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: So Mater, it's voice-activated. But you know, everything's voice- activated these days.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What? I thought you was supposed to be making me a disguise.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Cool! Hey, computer. Make me a German truck!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Check it out. I'm wearing Materhosen. Make me a monster truck!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I vant to siphon your gas. Now make me a taco truck!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: A funny car!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: The idea is to keep a low profile, Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: So I just go in, pretend to be this truck.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: And leave the rest to us.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Now hold still.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I have to do the final fitting on your disguise.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh dear. That's no good.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, what are you doing?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: The disguise won't calibrate effectively without a smooth surface to graft onto.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh. For a second there I thought you was trying to fix my dents.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I was.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well then no thank you. I don't get them dents buffed, pulled, filled or painted by nobody. They're way too valuable.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Your dents are valuable?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I come by each one of them with my best friend Lightning McQueen.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I don't fix these. I want to remember these dents forever.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: So you were being serious in Paris? McQueen isn't just part of your cover?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Friendships can be dangerous in our line of work, Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: But my line of work is towing and salvage.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Right. And Miss Shiftwell's is designing iPhone apps.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, I meant for real. I ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It's okay. Say no more. I'll work around the dent.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: In the meantime...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You look a little light on weapons.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, guys, I just really wish Mater were here.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, great. Here it comes. What've you got, Francesco?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I think you forgot the insulting part of that insult.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Gee, I maybe misjudged you, because that's exactly how I ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: And there's the insult we were missing. Grazie!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Scusatemi, tutti! Signori!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mio nonno, my grandfather, has broken down. If one of you would help I would be so thankful.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, no, don't fight over me.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Signore Tow Truck, per favore? CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Get ready, Mater. CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You're on any moment now. CUT BACK TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I don't know about this, Finn. What if I screw things up?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Impossible. Just apply the same level of dedication you've been using to play the "idiot tow truck" and you'll be fine.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It's just that them guys look pretty tough and --- Wait, did you say "idiot"? Is that how you see me?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's how everyone sees you. Isn't that the idea? I tell you, that's the genius of it. No one realizes they're being fooled because they're too busy laughing at the fool. Brilliant.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Why aren't you in disguise?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I, uh---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Come on, there's no time. Go!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Okay, okay. Computer: disguise.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: He's in.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wow, this place looks like it's made out of gold.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's because it is, Mater. Now, be careful what you say.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Why is that? What do you mean don't talk to you? So you want me to stop talking to you. Right now?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I have no idea what you're talking about...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: ...Alexander Hugo, aka "Chop Shop Alex."

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, you got a lot of aka's, Alex. But I guess that makes sense seeings how you's wanted in France, Germany, the Czech Republic...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: (cutting in to his

title: Cars-2
dialogue: He's so good.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Here we go.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Descramble that voice!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'm trying... It's too sophisticated!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What just happened?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'm working on it.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Holley?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'm detecting an extremely strong electromagnetic pulse.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Finn, it's the camera!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Where?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: On the tower.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Get out of the way! Andate!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Finn.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's what I'm talking about. Kachow! Hey, where are all the other cars?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh no. CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater. Abort the mission. They've got Finn. Get out of there. Get out of there right now!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh yeah, it's unbelievable.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Uh, of course I ain't leavin'.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'm just in shock like everybody...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Crashes are part of racing, I know. But something like that shouldn't ever happen.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Allinol.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: My friend Fillmore says the fuel's safe. That's good enough for me. I didn't stand by a friend of mine recently. I'm not gonna make the same mistake twice.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Dadgum.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Shoot. I didn't mean ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Whoa!!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wait wait! I didn't mean that kind of shoot!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Lemme through! Lemme through!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You gotta let me in! I gotta get through to warn McQueen!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, listen! I was disguised as a tow truck to infiltrate this Lemonhead meeting and my weapons system misinterperated what I was SAYING ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen! McQueen!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That really sounded like Mater. Mater?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen, they're gonna kill you!!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater?!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Excuse me.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Scusi. Mater! Scusi...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, I'm so glad to see you. I'm so sorr ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry. I thought I heard---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What? Oh. I mean, thanks.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I really thought I heard my friend.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wait, what?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Let me go!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Idiot? Is that how you see me?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's how everyone sees you. I tell you, that's the genius of it.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No one realizes they're being fooled because they're too busy laughing at the fool.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Domo arigato!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You done good! You got all the leaves!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Will you guys excuse me just for one little second?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Now that's a scoop of ice cream!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater?!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I never leak oil. Never.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, you have to get a hold of yourself. You're making a scene!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wait a minute. I didn't screw you up, did I?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I lost the race because of you!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Maybe if I talked to somebody, or---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I don't need your help. I don't want your help!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Bang a gong, get it on!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Listen, this isn't Radiator Springs. This is exactly why I don't bring you along to these things!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Holley! Finn! Where are we?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: We're in London, Mater. Inside Big Bentley.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Woaaaah! ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: This... this is all my fault.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Don't be a fool, Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: But I am, remember? You said so.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: When did I... Oh. Mater, I was complimenting you on what a good spy you are.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'm not a spy!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I've been trying to tell you that the whole time. I really am just a tow truck.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Finn, he's not joking.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I know.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You were right, Finn. I'm a fool. And what's happened to McQueen is `cause I'm such a big one. This is all my fault.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: He's still alive?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I called to talk to Mater. It never occurred to me that he wouldn't be there.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I know, but Sal, with everything going on I'm not sure I should---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Sir Axlerod.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, no, it's all right.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Listen, I ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: All right. For Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Backup plan??

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Dadgum lemons.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Nice try, Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Dadgum!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Dadgum! Dadgum! Dadgum!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: DADGUMDADGUMDADGUMDADGUM ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I gotta get you all out of there!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: There's no time. McQueen needs your help, Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: But I can't, I'm just a tow truck.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It's up to you. Go to the pits and get everyone out. You can do that.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What about you guys?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: We'll be okay.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Go and get some more dents, Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: So we'll be "okay"? Really?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: He wouldn't have left if I'd told him the truth. Being killed by a clock. Gives a whole new meaning to "your time has come."

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Time. That's it!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What are you doing?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Trying to turn back time. If I can just reverse the polarity...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Good job! Quick thinking, Holley!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What's everybody on the wrong side of the road for?!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh no!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Drive!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Burn rubber!!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: We've got to get to the course. Calculate the fastest way to ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Done.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Miss Shiftwell.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: They're standard issue now.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You kids get all the good hardware.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh no. That's Mater's.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I knew his escape was too easy.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Everybody get out! Get out now! Y'all gotta get out the pits!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hey, what are you guys doing here?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No! Everything's not okay! There's a bomb in here! Y'all gotta get out! Now!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Finn! You're okay!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, listen to me. The bomb is on you.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: They knew you'd try to help McQueen. When we were knocked out they planted it in your air filter.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Uh-oh.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater! There you are!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Stop right there!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh man, I've been so worried about you! CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Don't come any closer!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Are you okay?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, I'm not okay. Stay away from me!!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, wait. Wait! CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, wait!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, wait!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Stay back! If you get close to me, you gonna get hurt real bad!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I know I made you feel that way before, but none of that matters because we're best friends! CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen, you don't get it. I'm the bomb!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yes, Mater! You are the bomb! That's what I'm trying to say here. You've always been the bomb! And you'll always be the bomb.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Stay away!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No! Never!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'm not...letting you...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: ...get away again!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Gotta keep away from McQueen.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh my gosh!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Holley. I'll get Zundapp, you help Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Got it!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Do you really think I'm going to let you float away, Professor?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McQueen, let go!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Never!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, stop!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No way! You could get hurt!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh no.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, we've got to get that bomb off you.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Bomb?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah, they strapped it to me to kill you as a back-up plan.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Back-up plan? Mater, who put a bomb on you?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Death ray?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Turn off the bomb, Zundapp!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Deactivate! Deactivate!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Say it!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You read my mind.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: He was getting on my nerves.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What do we do?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'm gonna go out on a limb here. These are the guys that want me dead, correct?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Fellers, listen.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I know what you're going through. Everybody's been laughing at me my whole life too ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: --- but becoming powerful and rich beyond your wildest dreams ain't gonna make you feel better.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What's he saying?! What's wrong!?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I get it. I get it! I know what needs to be done.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Then do it!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What? No, I can't do it. Look, nobody takes me seriously. I know that now. This ain't Radiator Springs.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yes it is.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You're yourself in Radiator Springs. Be yourself here. And if people aren't taking you seriously, then they need to change. Not you. I know that, because I was wrong before. Now you can do this. You're the bomb.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Thanks, buddy.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No no no, you're the actual bomb. Now let's go!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, right! Hang on!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Where's he going?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Computer!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I need that thing you done before to get me away from McQueen!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Now I need you to do the chute, the second kind not the first!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, no, it's okay! Tell them, Mater. Explain.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Okay! Somebody's been sabotaging the racers and hurting the cars and I know who. Oh wait... Your Majesty.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hold your fire! He can't disarm it!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, I don't know what you're doing but stand down now!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: This ain't nothing at all like Radiator Springs.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, just cut to the chase!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Okay.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It's him.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I figured it out when I realized you all attached this ticking time bomb with Whitworth bolts. The same bolts that hold together that old British engine from the photograph. Holley! Show that picture.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: O-kay...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: And then I remembered what they say about old British engines - "If there ain't no oil under `em, there ain't no oil in `em."

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It was you leaking oil at the party in Japan. You just blamed it on me.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Then you're faking it. You didn't convert to no electric. We pop that hood we gonna see that engine from that picture right there.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: But Sir Axlerod created the race, Mater. Why would he want to hurt anyone?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: To make Allinol look bad so everybody'd go back to using oil. I mean, he said it himself with that disguised voice.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, he created Allinol.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah, but what if he found that huge oil field just as the world was trying to find something else?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What if he came up with Allinol just to make alternative fuel look bad?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: The engine from the photo.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It's a perfect match!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It's official. You're coming to all my races from now on.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Now you're talking!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater, let's go. You're on.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Go get `em, buddy.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: "Sir?" Shoot, you can just call me Mater, Your Majesty. I don't wanna hear none of this "Sir" business. By the way, have y'all met each other? Queen? McQueen. McQueen, Queen. McQueen? McMissile.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: McMissile, McQueen. Queen? McMissile.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: So there I was: rocket jets going full blast, McQueen hanging on for dear life when suddenly them two nasty lemons come out of nowhere, guns drawed. We was goners. But then out of nowhere, this beautiful spy car swoops in from the sky to save us!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: No, you're quite right. It does sound a bit far-fetched.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Holley! Finn!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Hello, Mater. It's so nice to see you again.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: What're you doing here?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Our satellites picked up an urgent communique.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh, man. Y'all is gonna have a great time. Everybody! This here's Finn McMissile. He's a secret agent. Don't tell nobody. And this is Holley Shiftwell. She's ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'm Mater's girlfriend. It's so nice to meet you all.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Oh no no. I'm keeping that dent. It's way too valuable.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You know, there's one thing I still don't get. The bad guys hit me with the beam from the camera, right? So why didn't I, you know...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Explode in a fiery inferno?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: We couldn't figure that one out either.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Our investigation proved that Allinol was actually gasoline. And Miles Axlerod engineered it so that when it got hit by the beam it would explode.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Wait a second. Fillmore, you said my fuel was safe.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I just figured, we never found out who the world's fastest car is. Plus: no press, no trophy. Just racing - the way I like it.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Francesco. I'd like you to meet ---

title: Cars-2
dialogue: It's just something I had made up for the occasion.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Yeah. Nice try.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's why I love you, Sally. Wish me luck.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Go McQueen!! Whoo-hoo!!!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Finn, time to go. Siddeley's gassed, geared and ready to fly.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: You're leaving already?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: We've got another mission, Mater. Just stopped by here to "pick something up."

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Something tells me you're not talking about souvenir bumper stickers.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Her Majesty asked for you personally, Mater.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: But I told you all before. I'm not a spy.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: We know.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Spy or not, you're still the smartest, most honest chap we've ever met.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Don't forget massively charming.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, thanks. But as much fun as it was hanging with y'all, this...

title: Cars-2
dialogue: This is home.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: That's alright, we understand. But I'll be back. You still owe me that first date.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: If there's ever anything I can do for you, just let me know.

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Well, I sure appreciate that, thank you. Actually... there is one thing. CUT TO:

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Whoo-hoo!!!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Mater!?

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Check it out. They let me keep the rockets!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: I'll see you at the finish line, buddy!

title: Cars-2
dialogue: Not if I see you first!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Come on idiot Why do you always have to be so selfish! You only think about yourself. Why can't you ever do as you're told!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: If dad wasn't fighting and the war was over we wouldn't have to go.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I will mum

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Come on, we've got to stay together now. Everything's going to be okay

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Bye Mom, we'll miss you

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Mrs. Macready?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: No, ma'am. It's just us.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: The sheets feel scratchy

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: ED!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Is it Latin?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: We could play hide-and-seek

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: but we're already having so much fun!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Please, please, please.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: One...two...three...four...

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Eight four, eighty five...

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Were you hiding from me?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: if you don't mind my asking...what are you?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I'm not a dwarf, I'm a girl! And actually I'm tallest in my class.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Well, my mum's name is Helen...

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Of course.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Well, I came in through the wardrobe in the spare room, and-

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Narnia? What's that?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: This is an awfully big wardrobe

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Glad to meet you, Mr. Tumnus! *extends hand* I'm Lucy Pevensie. Oh, you shake it!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I-I don't know! People do it when they meet each other.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Oh! Well, thank you very much! But I probably should be getting back...

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Well, maybe for just a little while... if you have... sardines.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Can I help you with that?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: He had a nice face. You look just like him.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: My father is fighting in the war.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Winter isn't all bad. There's ice skating and snow ball fights. Oh! And Christmas!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: No presents for a hundred years?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: yes please

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: : No, I'm afraid I'm not

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Oh I must go

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: No. You're the nicest faun I've ever met.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I'm sure you're very sorry, and you'll never do it again.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: What are you doing?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: But I thought you were my friend

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I think so. Keep it, you need it more than I do.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: 98, 99, 100... Ready or not here I come.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I'm back, I'm back, it's alright,

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: You know, I'm not sure if you two have quite gotten the idea of this game!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: but weren't you wondering where I was?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I don't think Lucy wants to play anymore.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: One game at a time Lu, we don't all have your imagination.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: But I wasn't imagining!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: You do?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Why don't you just stop it, you always have to make everything worse. Grow up!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: It was really there...

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Susan's right. That's enough..

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Edmund? Oh Edmund!!!! I saw Mr. Tumnus again and he's fine!!! The White Witch hasn't found out about him helping me!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: She calls herself the Queen of Narnia, but she really isn't. Edmund? Are you okay? You look awful.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Come on...this way.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Peter, Peter wake up! It's there, it's really there!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Lucy, what are talking about?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Narnia! It's all in the wardrobe, like I told you!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: No I wasn't, I saw Mr. Tumnus again! Oh, and this time - Edmund went too.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: You saw the faun?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Well, he didn't actually go there with me. What were you doing Edmund?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: We are very sorry sir, it won't happen again.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: We can handle it!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: The wardrobe upstairs, Lucy thinks she's found a forest inside.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: You're-you're not saying you believe her?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: You....you actually believe her?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Edmund said they were only pretending

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: No, this would be the first time.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Peter winds up, goes for the bowl!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Whoops! Wake up, Dolly Daydream!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I thought you said that it was a kid's game.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Are you ready then?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Well done, Ed!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Run!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Go!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Don't worry, it's probably just your imagination

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I don't suppose saying we're sorry would quite cover it?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: No, it wouldn't. But this might!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: You little liar!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Apologize to Lucy.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Say you're sorry!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: That's alright, some little children just don't know when to stop pretending.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I think Lucy must decide!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I all want you to meet Mr. Tumnus!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Well Mr. Tumnus it is

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: We can use these coats.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Well I don't think the professor will mind. And if you think about it logically we are not even taking them out of the wardrobe.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I know.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: LUCY!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Who would do something like this?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: But we have to help him!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: It's out of our hands now Lu.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: You don't get it do you? I'm the human!!! He helped ME!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Maybe we should call the police

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Don't worry Lucy, we'll think of something

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: It's a beaver.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Here, boy *clicks* come here...*clicks*

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Yes?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: This is the handkerchief I gave to Mr-

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Is he alright?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: He say's he knows the faun.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Yes. We were just talking

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: He means the trees.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Oh, what a beautiful dam Mr. Beaver.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: is there nothing we can do about Mr. Tumnus?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Well we haven't actually been here very long

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: waiting for us?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: And you think we're the ones???

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I think you've made a mistake; we're not heroes!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I think it's time we were going.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: But what about Mr. Tumnus?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Sorry Lucy. It's out of our hands.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Ed, time to go- Ed? I'm going to kill him.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Hurry up!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Edmund!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Get off me!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: We just can't let him go!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: So you knew this would happen?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Stop, this fighting isn't going to help Edmund

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Then take us to him.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Only if the Witch has toast.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: They're in the tunnel!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: This is what happens to the enemies of the White Witch.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Relax, I'm one of the good guys

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: An unfortunate family resemblance, but we can discuss family breeding later right now we need to move.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: What do you suggest?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Evening gents, Did we lose something?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Humans in Narnia, now that's some valuable information

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: They , they , were heading North.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: are you all right?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Well, I wish I could say their bark was worse than their bite.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Well I am afraid that is all the healing I have time for.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: It has been a pleasure my Queen. I have been asked by Aslan HIMSELF to gather more troops.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Like everything we have ever heard. He'll be a good help fighting the White Witch

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Surely King Peter...

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: We just want to get our brother back.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: It seems so far

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: If he tells me to Hurry up one more time I'm going to turn him into a big fluffy hat

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: He is getting kinda bossy

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Maybe she's gone.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I'll go and have a look

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: AHHH!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Merry Christmas, Sir!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Presents!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Well, I think I could be brave enough.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Told you he was real!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Did you hear what he said... winter is almost over. You no what that means... no more ice!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: We don't have time.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: No, you're trying to be smart...as usual!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Maybe you should.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Mum's not here!!!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Oh no!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: PETER!!!!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Hold onto me!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Has anyone seen my coat?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Forgive me your majesty

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Not to seem rude, but I wasn't actually talking to you

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Maybe they think you look funny.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: We have come to see Aslan.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: That's why we are here.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: He's been captured by the White Witch

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: It is my fault really. I was too hard on him.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Sir, he's our brother.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: No, that's just it...you're not who I think I am

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I don't think I will be able.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Not all of them.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Maybe we had bring back a whole trunk load when we go home.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Yes, before you go boring.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: EDMUND!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Oh, Edmund

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Get some rest...and Edmund try not to wander off again.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Narnia isn't going to run out of toast Edmund

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: then you better pack some for the journey

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: You are, I promised I'd keep you three safe but there's no reason I can't stay and help.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: but they need us...All four of us

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Lucy it's too dangerous. You almost drowned, Edmund was almost killed!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Where are you going?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Come on Ed, sword hand up like Oreius showed us.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Come and take it then.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Susan!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: We couldn't sleep

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Why doesn't he fight back?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: We can't just leave him here.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: The Trees

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: It is true, he's gone

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I can't

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: No, but I bet they help

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Are you with me?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: FOR NARNIA, AND FOR ASLAN!!!!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: I'm so cold.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Susan!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: We have to help them.

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Fall back! Draw them to the rocks!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Stop!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Susan this is...

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Ed! There are too many of them! Go! Get out of here! Get the girls, and get them home!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Edmund!!

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: When are you ever going to do are you're told?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: When?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: No, but he's good...

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: What did he say, Susan?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: What is this?

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Or a dream of a dream...Spare Oom

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Not again

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Come on

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: These aren't branches...

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: You wouldn't believe us if we told you

title: Chronicles-of-Narnia-The-Lion-the-Witch-and-the-Wardrobe
dialogue: Will we ever go back?

title: Coco
dialogue: Sometimes I think I'm cursed... 'cause of something that happened before I was even born.

title: Coco
dialogue: See, a long time ago there was this family.

title: Coco
dialogue: The papá, he was a musician.

title: Coco
dialogue: He and his family would sing, and dance, and count their blessings... But he also had a dream... to play for the world. And one day he left with his guitar... and never returned.

title: Coco
dialogue: And the mamá...? She didn't have time to cry over that walkaway musician! After banishing all music from her life...

title: Coco
dialogue: She found a way to provide for her daughter... She rolled up her sleeves and she learned to make shoes. She could have made candy!

title: Coco
dialogue: Or fireworks!

title: Coco
dialogue: Or sparkly underwear for wrestlers!

title: Coco
dialogue: But no... she chose shoes...

title: Coco
dialogue: Then she taught her daughter to make shoes. And later, she taught her son-in-law.

title: Coco
dialogue: Then her grandkids got roped in. As her family grew, so did the business.

title: Coco
dialogue: Music had torn her family apart, but shoes held them all together. You see, that woman was my great- great grandmother, Mamá Imelda.

title: Coco
dialogue: She died WAY before I was born. But my family still tells her story every year on Día de los Muertos -- the Day of the Dead... And her little girl?

title: Coco
dialogue: She's my great grandmother, Mamá Coco.

title: Coco
dialogue: Holá, Mamá Coco.

title: Coco
dialogue: Actually, my name is Miguel. Mamá Coco has trouble remembering things... But it's good to talk to her anyway. So I tell her pretty much everything.

title: Coco
dialogue: I used to run like this...

title: Coco
dialogue: But now I run like this which is way faster!

title: Coco
dialogue: And the winner is... Luchadora Coco!

title: Coco
dialogue: I have a dimple on this side, but not on this side. Dimple. No dimple. Dimple. No dimple--

title: Coco
dialogue: My Abuelita? She's Mamá Coco's daughter.

title: Coco
dialogue: No, gracias.

title: Coco
dialogue: S-sí?

title: Coco
dialogue: Abuelita runs our house just like Mamá Imelda did.

title: Coco
dialogue: I think we're the only family in México who hates music...

title: Coco
dialogue: And my family's fine with that...

title: Coco
dialogue: But me?

title: Coco
dialogue: Love you, Mamá!

title: Coco
dialogue: I am NOT like the rest of my family...

title: Coco
dialogue: Hola!

title: Coco
dialogue: Muchas gracias!

title: Coco
dialogue: Hey, hey! Dante!

title: Coco
dialogue: Sit. Down. Roll over. Shake. Fist bump.

title: Coco
dialogue: Good boy, Dante!

title: Coco
dialogue: I know I'm not supposed to love music -- but it's not my fault! It's his: Ernesto de la Cruz...

title: Coco
dialogue: ...The greatest musician of all time.

title: Coco
dialogue: He started out a total nobody from Santa Cecilia, like me. But when he played music, he made people fall in love with him.

title: Coco
dialogue: He starred in movies. He had the coolest guitar... He could fly!

title: Coco
dialogue: And he wrote the best songs! But my all-time favorite? It's--

title: Coco
dialogue: He lived the kind of life you dream about... Until 1942...

title: Coco
dialogue: When he was crushed by a giant bell.

title: Coco
dialogue: I wanna be just like him.

title: Coco
dialogue: Sometimes, I look at de la Cruz and I get this feeling... like we're connected somehow. Like, if HE could play music, maybe someday I could too...

title: Coco
dialogue: ...If it wasn't for my family.

title: Coco
dialogue: Huh?

title: Coco
dialogue: Oh, yeah, sorry.

title: Coco
dialogue: I just can't really talk about any of this at home so...

title: Coco
dialogue: I could never say that...

title: Coco
dialogue: I don't know. I mean... I only really play for myself--

title: Coco
dialogue: Uh-uh, my family would freak!

title: Coco
dialogue: ...Seize your moment?

title: Coco
dialogue: Abuelita!

title: Coco
dialogue: Um...uh...

title: Coco
dialogue: He was just showing me his guitar...

title: Coco
dialogue: Yes, Tío Berto.

title: Coco
dialogue: No, no, no!

title: Coco
dialogue: It's just Dante...

title: Coco
dialogue: I was just shining shoes!

title: Coco
dialogue: But the plaza's where all the foot traffic is.

title: Coco
dialogue: But what about tonight?

title: Coco
dialogue: Well they're having this talent show-

title: Coco
dialogue: And I thought I might...

title: Coco
dialogue: Well, maybe?

title: Coco
dialogue: I thought we were done...

title: Coco
dialogue: Like Mamá Coco's papá?

title: Coco
dialogue: But you're the one who--

title: Coco
dialogue: I was just--

title: Coco
dialogue: But--

title: Coco
dialogue: Oh, it's you. Get in here, c'mon, Dante. Hurry up.

title: Coco
dialogue: You're gonna get me in trouble, boy. Someone could hear me!

title: Coco
dialogue: I wish someone wanted to hear me...

title: Coco
dialogue: Other than you...

title: Coco
dialogue: Perfecto!

title: Coco
dialogue: ...and make it come true.

title: Coco
dialogue: No more hiding, Dante. I gotta seize my moment!

title: Coco
dialogue: I'm gonna play in Mariachi Plaza if it kills me!

title: Coco
dialogue: Get under, get under!

title: Coco
dialogue: Nothing!

title: Coco
dialogue: Mamá -- Papá, I--

title: Coco
dialogue: What?!

title: Coco
dialogue: But what if I'm no good at making shoes?

title: Coco
dialogue: ...A shoemaker. Through and through.

title: Coco
dialogue: Dante! No, Dante, stop!

title: Coco
dialogue: No, no, no, no, no! No...

title: Coco
dialogue: De la Cruz's guitar...?

title: Coco
dialogue: Mamá Coco, is your papá... Ernesto de la Cruz?

title: Coco
dialogue: Ha, ha!

title: Coco
dialogue: Papá! Papá!

title: Coco
dialogue: It's him! I know who my great- great grandfather was!

title: Coco
dialogue: Mamá Coco's father was Ernesto de la Cruz!

title: Coco
dialogue: I'm gonna be a musician!

title: Coco
dialogue: It's not a fantasy!

title: Coco
dialogue: That man was Ernesto de la Cruz! The greatest musician of all time!

title: Coco
dialogue: But Papá, you said my family would guide me! Well de la Cruz IS my family! I'm supposed to play music!

title: Coco
dialogue: If you would just let--

title: Coco
dialogue: Just listen to me play--

title: Coco
dialogue: I don't care if I'm on some stupid ofrenda!

title: Coco
dialogue: No!

title: Coco
dialogue: I don't wanna be in this family!

title: Coco
dialogue: I wanna play in the plaza. Like de la Cruz! Can I still sign-up?

title: Coco
dialogue: No... But if I can borrow a guitar--

title: Coco
dialogue: Excuse me, can I borrow your guitar?

title: Coco
dialogue: You guys have a spare guitar?

title: Coco
dialogue: I need a guitar, just for a little bit--

title: Coco
dialogue: Great-great grandfather... What am I supposed to do?

title: Coco
dialogue: No, no, no, no, no, Dante stop! Cállate! Shhh!

title: Coco
dialogue: I'm sorry...

title: Coco
dialogue: Señor de la Cruz? Please don't be mad. I'm Miguel, your great-great grandson... I need to borrow this.

title: Coco
