dialogue: Who hired you? Tell us... tell us now!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Toxic Dart...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Representative Binks. I know I can count on you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What?!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You're a good friend, Jar Jar. I don't wish to hold you up. I'm sure you have a great deal to do.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I do not like this idea of hiding.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Don't worry. Now that the Council has ordered an investigation, it won't take Master Obi-Wan long to find that bounty hunter.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I haven't worked for a year to defeat the "Military Creation Act" not to be here when its fate is decided.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Sometimes we have to let go of our pride and do what is requested of us.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Pride?!? Annie, you're young, and you don't have a very firm grip on politics. I suggest you reserve your opinions for some other time.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Sorry, M'lady. I was only trying to...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Annie! No!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Please don't call me that.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Annie...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I've always called you that... it is your name, isn't it?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It's Anakin. When you say Annie it's like I'm still a little boy... and I'm not.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm sorry, Anakin. It's impossible to deny you've... ...that you've grown up.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Master Obi-Wan manages not to see it...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Mentors have a way of seeing more of our faults than we would like. It's the only way we grow.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Don't get me wrong... Obi-Wan is a great mentor. As wise as Master Yoda and as powerful as Master Windu. I am truly thankful to be his apprentice. Only... although I'm a Padawan learner, in some ways... a lot of ways... I'm ahead of him. I'm ready for the trials. I know I am! He knows it too. He believes I'm too unpredictable... Other Jedi my age have gone through the trials and made it... I know I started my training late... but he won't let me move on.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: That must be frustrating.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It's worse... he's overly critical. He never listens! He just doesn't understand! It's not fair!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm sorry... You sounded exactly like that little boy I once knew, when he didn't get his way.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm not whining! I'm not.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I didn't say it to hurt you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I know...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Don't try to grow up too fast.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I am grown up. You said it yourself.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Please don't look at me like that.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Why not?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Because I can see what you're thinking.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Ahh... so, you have Jedi powers too?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It makes me feel uncomfortable.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Sorry, M'lady.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Thank you, Captain. Take good care of Dorme... the threat's on you two now.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You'll be fine.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Then my Jedi protector will have to prove how grown up he is.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin, you stay put on Naboo. Do not attract any attention. Do absolutely nothing without checking in with me or the Council.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Yes, Master.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I will get to the bottom of this plot quickly, M'Lady. You'll be back here in no time.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I will be most grateful for your speed, Master Jedi.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Time to go.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I know.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: May the Force be with you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: May the Force be with you, Master.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Suddenly, I'm afraid...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm kinda scared too. This is my first assignment on my own.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: There's nothing to worry about... we have Artoo with us.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I hope he doesn't try anything foolish.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It's a toxic dart. I need to know where it came from and who made it.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Excuse me? Could you try again please?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Thanks for your assistance! You may not be able to figure this out, but I think I know someone who might.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: No, no, Mom, no...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You seemed to be having a nightmare.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Are you hungry?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Thank you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: We went into lightspeed a while ago.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I look forward to seeing Naboo again. I've thought about it every day since I left. It's by far the most beautiful place I've ever seen...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You were just a little boy then. It may not be as you remember it; time changes your perception.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I think time has given me much more mature feelings to enhance my perception.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It must be difficult having sworn your life to the Jedi... not being able to visit the places you like... or do the things you like...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Or be with the people I love.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Are you allowed to love? I thought that was forbidden for a Jedi.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Attachment is forbidden. Possession is forbidden. Compassion, which I would define as unconditional love, is central to a Jedi's life, so you might say we're encouraged to love.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You have changed so much

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You haven't changed a bit. You're exactly the way I remember you in my dreams. I doubt if Naboo has changed much either.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It hasn't...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I can't wait to breathe the sweet breeze that comes off the rolling hills. Whenever I try to visualise the Force, those hills are what I see.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I love Naboo.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Were you dreaming about you mother earlier, weren't you?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Yes... I left Tatooine so long ago, my memory of her is fading. I don't want to lose it. Recently I've been seeing her in my dreams... vivid dreams... scary dreams. I worry about her.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm looking for Dexter.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: He's not in trouble. It's personal.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Hey, Dex.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Thank you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Hey, Dex.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You can tell me what this is.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Do you know where it came from?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Kamino Kyberdart... I wonder why it didn't show up in any analysis archive.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Well, Dex, if droids could think, we wouldn't be here, would we? Kamino... doesn't sound familiar. Is it part of the Republic?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Cloners? Are they friendly?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: On what, Dex?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: If I grew up here, I don't think I'd ever leave.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I doubt that.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: No, really. When I started my training, I was very homesick and very lonely. This city and my Mom were the only pleasant things I had to think about... The problem was, the more I thought about my Mom, the worse I felt. But I would feel better if I thought about the palace - the way it shimmers in the sunlight - the way the air always smells of flowers...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: ...and the soft sound of the distant waterfalls. The first time I saw the Capital, I was very young... I'd never seen a waterfall before. I though they were so beautiful... I never dreamed one day I'd live in the palace.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Well, tell me, did you dream of power and politics when you were a little girl?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: No! That was the last thing I thought of. My dream was to help in the "Refugee Relief Movement." I never thought of running for elected office. But the more history I studied, the more I realised how much good politicians could do. So when I was eight, I joined the "Apprentice Legislators", then later on became a Senatorial advisor, with such a passion that, before I knew it, I was elected Queen. Partly because I scored so high on my education certificate, but for the most part it was my conviction that reform was possible. I wasn't the youngest Queen ever elected, but now that I think back on it, I'm not sure I was old enough. I'm not sure I was ready.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: The people you served thought you did a good job. I heard they tried to amend the Constitution so you could stay in office.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Popular rule is not democracy, Annie. It gives the people what they want, not what they need. And, truthfully, I was relieved when my two terms were up. So were my parents. They worried About me during the blockade and couldn't wait for it all to be over. Actually, I was hoping to have a family by now... My sisters have the most amazing, wonderful kids... but when the Queen asked me to serve as Senator, I couldn't refuse her.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I agree! I think the Republic needs you... I'm glad you chose to serve. I feel things are going to happen in our generation that will change the galaxy in profound ways.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I think so too.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Thank you, Your Highness. I only Wish I could have served you better by staying on Coruscant for the vote.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: About two hundred. And more are leaving the Republic every day. If the Senate votes to create an army, I'm sure it's going to push us into a civil war.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Not if they feel threatened. The separatists don't have an army, but if they are provoked, they will move to defend themselves. I'm sure of that. And with no time or money to build an army, my guess is they will turn to the Commerce Guilds or the Trade Federation for help.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm afraid that, despite the Chancellor's best efforts, there are still many bureaucrats, judges, and even Senators on the payrolls of the Guilds.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: There are rumours, Your Highness, that the Federation Army was not reduced as they were ordered.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: The Jedi have not been allowed to investigate. It would be to be too dangerous for the economy, we were told.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Let's pray that day never comes.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin's not a Jedi yet, Counsellor. He's still a Padawan learner. I was thinking...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Hey, hold on a minute!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Excuse me! I was thinking I would stay in the Lake Country. There are some places up there that are very isolated.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Excuse me?! I am in charge of security here, M'Lady.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Annie, my life is at risk, and this is my home. I know it very well... that is why we're here. I think it would be wise for you to take advantage of my knowledge in this instance.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Sorry, M'Lady.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Yes... yes, I did...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I never understood why he quit. Only twenty Jedi have ever left the Order.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What happened?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Really?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Interesting... I'm still not sure I understand.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Yes, I'm trying to find a planet system called Kamino. It doesn't seem to show upon any of the archive charts.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: According to my information, it should be in this quadrant somewhere... just south of the Rishi Maze.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: All three actually.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Absolutely.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Wouldn't that be on record?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: That's impossible... perhaps the archives are incomplete.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: There's my house!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What? Don't say you're shy!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: No, but I...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Ryoo!! Pooja!!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm so happy to see you! This is Anakin. Anakin, this is Ryoo, and this is Pooja.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin, this is my sister, Sola.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Hello.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: A little.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: He's being polite, Mom. We're starving.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Sola!! He isn't my boyfriend! He's a Jedi assigned by the Senate to protect me.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It's not, Mom, I promise. Anyway, Anakin's a friend. I've known him for years. Remember that little boy who was with the Jedi during the blockade crisis?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: He grew up.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Mom, I'm not in any danger.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: ...Yes... I'm afraid she is.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: But not much.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Padme tells me you teach at the university?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What's there to talk about? He's just a boy.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Sola - stop it!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm not your baby sister, Sola. Anakin and I are friends... our relationship is strictly professional. Mom, would you tell her to stop it?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Cut it out.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Oh, Mom, you're impossible. What I'm doing is important.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: There have been two attempts on her life. Chances are there'll be more. My Master is tracking down the assassins. I'm sure he'll find out who they are. This situation, won't last long.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I don't either.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Don't worry, this won't take long.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I just want to get there before dark.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You still live at home.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I move around so much, I've never had a place of my own. Official residences have no warmth. I feel good here. I feel at home.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I never had a real home. Home was always where my Mom was.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Is this you?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: That was when I went with the Relief Group to Shadda-Bi-Boran. Their sun was imploding, and the planet was dying. I was helping to relocate the children. See that little one I'm holding? His name was N'a-kee-tula, which means sweethear. He was so full of life,. All those kids were. I did everything I could to save him, but he died... they all did. They were never able to adapt... to live off their native planet.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: My first day as an Apprentice Legislator. Notice the difference?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I am sorry to disturb you, Master.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Im looking for a planet described to me by an old friend. I trust him. But the system doesnt show up on the archive maps.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: This is where it ought to be... but it isnt. Gravity is pulling all the stars in this area inward to this spot. There should be a star here... but there isnt.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: But Master Yoda who could have erased information from the archives? Thats impossible, isnt it?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: When I was in Level Three, we used to come here for school retreat. See that island? We used to swim there every day. I love the water.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I do too. I guess it comes from growing up on a desert planet.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: ...We used to lie on the sand and let the sun dry us... and try to guess the names of the birds singing.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I dont like sand. Its coarse and rough and irritating, and it gets everywhere. Not like here. Here everythings soft... and smooth...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: There was a very old man who lived on the island. He used to make glass out of sand - and vases and necklaces out of the glass. They were magical.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Everything here is magical.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You could look into the glass and see the water. The way it ripples and moves. It looked so real... but it wasnt.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Sometimes, when you believe something to be real, it becomes real. Real enough, anyway...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I used to think if you looked too deeply into glass, you would lose yourself.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I think it's true...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I shouldn't have done that.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm sorry. When I'm around you, my mind is no longer my own.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It's the situation... the stress...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: ...the view.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I am concerned for my Padawan. He is not ready to be on his own.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: But he still has much to learn. And his abilities have made him... well... arrogant. I realise now what you and Master Yoda knew from the beginning... the boy was too old to start the training and...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Master, he should not have been given this assignment. I'm afraid Anakin won't be able to protect the Senator.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: He has a... an emotional connection with her. It's been there since he was boy. Now he's confused... distracted.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Has Master Yoda gained any insight into whether or not this war will come about?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You did that?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: That! Now stop it!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin!!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm not really supposed to do that... for fun, I mean. If Master Obi-Wan were here, he'd be very grumpy.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: May I tell you something?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I don't know.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Then how can I tell you?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Maybe you should use your Jedi intuition.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It doesn't work around you. My mind is always a muddle... I can only think of you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin, don't...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: From the moment I met you, all those years ago, a day hasn't gone by when I haven't thought of you. And now that I'm close to you again, I'm in agony. The closer I get to you, the worse it gets. The thought of not being with you mskes my stomach turn over - my mouth goes dry. I feel dizzy. I can't breathe. I'm haunted by the kiss you should never have given me. My heart is beating, hoping that kiss will not become a scar. You are in my very soul, tormenting me. What can I do? I will do anything you ask...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: If you are suffering as much as I am, tell me.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: ...I can't. We can't. It's just not possible.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anything's possible. Padme, please listen...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You listen. We live in a real world. Come back to it. You're studying to become a Jedi Knight. I'm a Senator. If you follow your thoughts through to conclusion, they will take us to a place we cannot go... regardless of the way we feel about each other.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Then you do feel something! There's an extraordinary connection between us. You can't deny that.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Annie, it doesn't make any difference. Jedi aren't allowed to marry. You swore an oath, remember? You'd be expelled from the Order. I will not let you give up your responsibilities... your future, for me.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I was destined to be a Jedi. I don't think I could be anything else. But you are asking me to be rational. That is something I know I cannot do. I wish I could wish my feelings away... but I can't.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I am not going to give into this. I'm not going to throw my life away. I have more important things to do than fall in love.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It wouldn't have to be that way... we could keep it a secret.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Then we'd be living a lie - one we couldn't keep even if we wanted to. Mt sister saw it. So did my mother. I couldn't do that. Could you, Anakin? Could you live like that?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: ...No, you're right. It would destroy us.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm expected?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Obi-Wan Kenobi.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You make me feel most welcome.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: That is... good news.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm sorry Master - ?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Oh, yes. Sido-Dyas.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: That's why I'm here.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I don't know...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Sure you do... you just don't want to tell me.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Are you going to use one of your Jedi mind tricks on me?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: They only work on the weak-minded. You are anything but weak-minded.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: All right... his name was Palo. I was twelve. We were both in the Legislative Youth Program. He was a few years older then I... very cute... dark curly hair... dreamy eyes.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: All right, I get the picture... whatever happened to him?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I went on to become a Queen. He went on to become an artist.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Maybe he was the smart one.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You really don't like politicians, do you?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I like two or three, but I'm not really sure about one of them. I don't think the system works.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: How would you have it work?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: We need a system where the politicians sit down and discuss the problems, agree what's in the best interests of all the people, and then do it.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: That is exactly what we do. The trouble is that people don't wlways agree. In fact, they hardly ever do.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Then they should be made to.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: By whom? Who's going to make them?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I don't know. Someone.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Of course not me.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: But someone.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Someone wise.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: That sounds an awful lot like a dictatorship to me.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Well, if it works...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You're making fun of me.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: On no, I'd be much too frightened to tease a Senator.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You're so bad!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You're always so serious. Always carrying the weight of the universe on your shoulders.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Who was the original host?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Where is this bounty hunter now?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Unaltered?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I would like to meet this Jango Fett.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You mentioned growth acceleration...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: And these?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Very impressive.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Tell me, prime minister, when my Master Sido-dyas first contacted you, did he say the order was for... himself... or?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: The Repubic?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Arfour, Arfour...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Arfour, relay this, "scramble code five," to Courscant: care of "the old folks home."

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: ...I've never heard of a Jedi called Sido-Dyas, have you, Master?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I have a strong feeling that this bounty hunter is the assassin we're looking for.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I will, Master, and I will also find out more about this clone army... May The Force...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: No...No...No...Mom!...Don't, no, don't!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Don't go.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I don't want to disturb you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Your presence is soothing.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You had a nightmare again last night.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Jedi don't have nightmares.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I heard you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I saw my mother. I saw her as clearly as I see you now. She's suffering, Padme. She is in pain...They're killing her! I know I'm disobeying my mandate to protect you, Senator. I know I will be punished and possibly thrown out of the Jedi Order, but I must go. I have to help her! I'm sorry, Padme. I don't have a choice.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Annie, I told you I wouldn't let you give up your future for me. I'll go with you. That way you can continue to protect me, and you won't be disobeying your mandate.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What about Master Obi-wan?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I guess we won't tell him, will we?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Your clones are very impressive. You must be very proud.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Aren't we all?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Ever made your way as far into the interior as Coruscant?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Recently?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Then you must know Master Sido- Dyas?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Sido-Dyas. Isnt he the Jedi who hired you for this job?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: No? I thought...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Curious...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It seems to me it's your army - being that they are all clones of you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I look forward to seeing them in action. Thank you for your time, Jango.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Wait, please.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Excuse me, Watto.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I said excuse me.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Let me help you with that.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm looking for Shmi Skywalker.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: My mother...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Sold her...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Do you know where they are?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'd like to know.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I won't forget.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Stay with the ship, Artoo.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Good evening. May I help you?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Threepio?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Oh, my... oh, my! Master Anakin! My goodness, I can hardly believe it! And this must be Miss Padme.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Hello, Threepio.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I've come to see my mother.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Oh, dear! I'm so terribly sorry, Master Annie.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Threepio, what's happened?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I think we'd better go inside.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Master Lars - Master Owen! Somebody to see you!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm Anakin Skywalker. I'm here looking for my mother.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm Padme.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Is my mother here?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: To find my mother.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: No, Annie!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I can feel her pain, and I will find her. I know she's alive.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You are going to have to stay here. These are good people, Padme. You'll be safe.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I trust you'll watch over her, Owen.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I won't be long.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Please don't leave us, Miss Padme. These people need your help.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm not leaving, Threepio. I just can't sleep.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: That's something I cannot relate to. As a Protocol Droid, I'm either active or inactive. There's no in-between.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I guess you're lucky.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Do you really think so..? I suppose I shouldn't expect...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You're not happy here?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Oh, I'm not unhappy... and my masters here ar so kind I wouldn't wish to trouuble them, it's just... being like this... well, it's embarrassing.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Being like what?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Naked. If you pardon the expression. You see, when Master Annie made me, he never quite found the time to give me any outer covering. It's so humiliating. How would you like it if you had to go around with all your circuits showing?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I guess I wouldn't like it at all.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Of course you wouldn't. Nobody would. It's simply not protocol.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Maybe we can do something about it.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I don't think so. Only Master Annie...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Why not? They seem to have a box of old coverings here.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Oh? How observant of you, Miss Padme. Of course, I'm just not mechanically minded... if you see what I mean.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Let's see, if we put this... here...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Ooooh! That's tickles.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You'll have to be quiet, Threepio. Hold still, please.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Mom... Mom... Mom...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Im here, Mom. Youre safe. Hang on. Im going to get you out of here...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Just stay with me, Mom. Im going to make you well again. Everythings going to be fine.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: "Guiding light" to "old folks home."

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: ...Starships from the Trade Federation and the Commerce Guilds are taking deliveries of battle droids from the foundries on Geonosis.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: The droid foundry seems to be working at full capacity. I am going to go down and investigate. I will bring Jango Fett back home for interrogation.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: One more thing. Jango mentioned he was recruited by someone named Darth Tyranus. Any idea who that might be?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Do you believe he could be the mysterious Sido-Dyas, who made the deal for the clone army?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Let me see if I can figure out what's going on first.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: There!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Um. How do I look?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Perfect? Oh, Miss Padme, I'm so happy! Oh, pardon me.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Thank you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Oh, my!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: ...Alliance have pledged their armies to Count Dooku and are forming an... Wait!... ah... attack... I don't... make it... aaaggghhh!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm going after him!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I thought the first thing he said was to retransmit his message to Coruscant.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Yeah, you're right, you're right.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Understood, Master.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: They'll never get there in time to save him. They have to come half way across the galaxy. Look, Geonosis is less than a parsec away.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: If he's still alive.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Annie, are you just going to sit here and let him die?? He's your friend... your mentor...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: ...He's like my father, but you heard Master Windu. He gave me strict orders to stay here.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: He gave you strict orders to protect me...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: ...and I'm going to save Obi-Wan. So if you plan to protect me, you will have to come along.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Hey, where are you going?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: To find Obi-Wan.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: No! You're not!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Let go of me!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm not letting you go out there. It's too dangerous.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What?!?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It's my job to protect you. I said it's too dangerous. You're not going, and that's final!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Don't you give me orders, Annie! I'm a Senator of the Galactic Republic. You have no authority to contain me, restrain me, or direct me! You remember your place, young man. Now you can come along and protect me or stay here. It's up to you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Yes, it is, Artoo. Most confusing. One moment they're generating a pleasant mutual attraction and the next, waves of violent hostility. Even though I'm programmed to understand them, I doubt if I ever shall.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It's empty!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Wait!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Count Dooku, I assume.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Don't worry he's housebroken.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You are holding a Jedi Knight, Obi- Wan Kenobi. I am formally requesting you turn him over to me, now.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: He is an officer of the Republic. You can't do that.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: And if I don't join your rebellion, I assume this Jedi with me will also die?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: The ideals are still alive, Count, even if the institution is failing.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: If what you say is true, you should stay in the Republic and help Chancellor Palpatine put things right.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I cannot believe that. I will not forsake all I have honoured and worked for and betray the Republic. I know of your treaties with the Trade Federation, the Commerce Guilds, and the others, Count. What is happening here is not government that has been bought out by business... it's business becoming government!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What is to happen to me? Am I to be executed also?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You are committing an act of war, Archduke. I hope you are prepared for the consequences.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Don't be afraid.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm not afraid to die. I've been dying a little bit each day since you came back into my life.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What are you talking about?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I love you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You love me?! I thought we decided not to fall in love. That we would be forced to live a lie. That it would destroy our lives...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I think our lives are about to be destroyed anyway. My love for you is a puzzle, Annie, for which I have no answers. I can't control it... and now I don't care. I truly, deeply love you, and before we die I want you to know.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I have no desire to be cured of this love either. Long or short, I vow to spend the rest of my life with you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I was beginning to wonder if you had gotten my message.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I retransmitted it as you requested, Master. Then we decided to come and rescue you.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It looks like you're going a good job so far.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I have a bad feeling about this.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Take the one the left. I'll take the one on the right.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: What about Padme?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It looks like she's already on top of things.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You okay?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Sure! Well, sort of.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Jump!!!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Yes, it has been rather a long time. Do you suppose something's happened to them?

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Danger? Oh no, I shouldn't think so. It looks a very dull planet to me. They should be back shortly. Just stop worrying, Artoo.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I don't hear anything. You're scaring me! Stop imagining things!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Someone's got to - shut down - these droids.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Look!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm sure I heard something, this time. Didn't you? It's probably just a celebration

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Hold on! Look over there...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: It's Dooku, go after him!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Padme!!!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Put the ship down! Down!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: No! Forget her. We have to go after Dooku.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: No we're not!! Land this ship!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Don't let your personal feelings get in the way. We've got a job to do.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I don't care!.. Go back.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin! She's all right! Look.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Follow that speeder!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: We move in together - you slowly on the...

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm taking him now!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin, no!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You'll pay for all the Jedi you've killed today, Dooku.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I don't think so.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: You will have to prove it.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I'm a slow learner.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Don't bet on it!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: Anakin!

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: On his way back to Naboo. He is escorting Senator Amidala home.

title: Star-Wars-Attack-of-the-Clones
dialogue: I must admit without the clones, it would not have been a victory.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Of course I'm worried. And you should be, too. Lando Calrissian and poor Chewbacca never returned from this awful place.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Don't be so sure. If I told you half the things I've heard about this Jabba the Hutt, you'd probably short-circuit.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Artoo, are you sure this is the right place? I better knock, I suppose.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Goodness gracious me!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Artoo Detoowha bo Seethreepiowha ey toota odd mischka Jabba du Hutt.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I don't think they're going to let us in, Artoo. We'd better go.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Artoo, wait. Oh, dear! Artoo. Artoo, I really don't think we should rush into all this.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, Artoo! Artoo, wait for me!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Just you deliver Master Luke's message and get us out of here. Oh my! Oh! Oh, no.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, my! Die Wanna Wauaga. We -- we bring a message to your master, Jabba the Hutt.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: He says that our instructions are to give it only to Jabba himself.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm terribly sorry. I'm afraid he's ever so stubborn about these sort of things.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Artoo, I have a bad feeling about this.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Good morning.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: The message, Artoo, the message.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Greetings, Exalted One. Allow me to introduce myself. I am Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight and friend to Captain Solo. I know that you are powerful, mighty Jabba, and that your anger with Solo must be equally powerful. I seek an audience with Your Greatness to bargain for Solo's life. With your wisdom, I'm sure that we can work out an arrangement which will be mutually beneficial and enable us to avoid any unpleasant confrontation. As a token of my goodwill, I present to you a gift: these two droids.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: What did he say?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: This can't be! Artoo, you're playing the wrong message.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: We're doomed.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Artoo, look! Captain Solo. And he's still frozen in carbonite.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: What could possibly have come over Master Luke. Is it something I did? He never expressed any unhappiness with my work. Oh! Oh! Hold it! Ohh!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I am See-Threepio, human-cy...

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh. Well, yes.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I am fluent in over six million forms of communication, and can readily...

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Disintegrated?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, no! Chewbacca!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, uh, yes, uh, I am here, Your Worshipfulness. Uh... yes!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh. The illustrious Jabba bids you welcome and will gladly pay you the reward of twenty-five thousand.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Uh, oh... but what, what did I say? Uh, the mighty Jabba asks why he must pay fifty thousand.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Because he's holding a thermal detonator.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Jabba offers the sum of thirty-five. And I suggest you take it.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: He agrees!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I can't see.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Where am I?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Who are you?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Someone who loves you.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Leia!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I gotta get you out of here.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: What's that? I know that laugh.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hey, Jabba. Look, Jabba, I was just on my way to pay you back, but I got a little sidetracked. It's not my fault.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Look...

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Jabba... I'll pay you triple! You're throwing away a fortune here. Don't be a fool!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: We have powerful friends. You're gonna regret this...

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Ugh!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Ohhh, I can't bear to watch.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Chewie? Chewie, is that you?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Ah! Chew--Chewie!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Wait. I can't see, pal. What's goin' on?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Luke? Luke's crazy. He can't even take care of himself, much less rescue anybody.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: A...Jedi Knight? I--I'm out of it for a little while, everybody gets delusions of grandeur.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm all right, pal. I'm all right.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I must speak with Jabba.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You will take me to Jabba now!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You serve your master well.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: And you will be rewarded.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: At last! Master Luke's come to rescue me.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I must be allowed to speak.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You will bring Captain Solo and the Wookiee to me.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Nevertheless, I'm taking Captain Solo and his friends. You can either profit by this... or be destroyed! It's your choice. But I warn you not to underestimate my powers.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Master Luke, you're standing on...

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, no! The Rancor!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Han!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Luke!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Are you all right?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Fine. Together again, huh?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Wouldn't miss it.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: How are we doing?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: The same as always.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: That bad, huh? Where's Leia?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm here.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, dear. His High Exaltedness, the great Jabba the Hutt, has decreed that you are to be terminated immediately.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Good, I hate long waits.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You will therefore be taken to the Dune Sea and cast into the pit of Carkoon, the nesting place of the all-powerful Sarlacc.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: In his belly, you will find a new definition of pain and suffering, as you are slowly digested over a thousand years.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: On second thought, let's pass on that, huh?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You should have bargained, Jabba. That's the last mistake you'll ever make.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I think my eyes are getting better. Instead of a big dark blur, I see a big light blur.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: There's nothing to see. I used to live here, you know.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You're gonna die here, you know. Convenient.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Just stick close to Chewie and Lando. I've taken care of everything.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh... great!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, I'm terribly sor... Artoo! What are you doing here?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Well, I can see you're serving drinks, but this place is dangerous. They're going to execute Master Luke and, if we're not careful, us too!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hmm. I wish I had your confidence.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Victims of the almighty Sarlacc: His Excellency hopes that you will die honorably. But should any of you wish to beg for mercy, the great Jabba the Hutt will now listen to your pleas.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Threepio, you tell that slimy piece of... worm-ridden filth he'll get no such pleasure from us. Right?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Jabba! This is your last chance. Free us or die.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Easy, Chewie.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Chewie, you okay? Where is he?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm okay, pal.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Lando!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Boba Fett?! Boba Fett?! Where?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Lando, grab it!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm trying!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Whoa! Whoa! Grab me, Chewie! I'm slipping.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Grab it! L--Lando. Grab!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Grab it! Almost... You almost got it!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Gently now. All... all right. Now easy, easy. Hold me, Chewie.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Chewie! Chewie, give me the gun. Don't move, Lando.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: It's all right. Trust me. Don't move.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Chewie, Pull us up! Come on! Okay... up, Chewie, up!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Come on. We gotta get out of here quick.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Not my eyes! Artoo, help! Quickly, Artoo. Oh! Ohhh! You beast!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Point it at the deck!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Artoo, where are we going? I couldn't possibly jump.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Come on!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Let's go! And don't forget the droids.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I don't know. All I can see is a lot of blowing sand!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: That's all any of us can see.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: No, I'm thinking a lot about it. That carbon freeze was the closest thing to dead there is. And it wasn't just sleepin'. It was a big wide awake nothing!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Why don't you leave that crate and come with us?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I have a promise I have to keep first... to an old friend.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Guess I owe you some thanks, too, Lando.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: He means "You're welcome."

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'll meet you back at the fleet.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I will.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: That's right, Artoo. We're going to the Dagobah system. I have a promise to keep... to an old friend.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: No... of course not.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Master Yoda, you can't die.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: But I need your help. I've come back to complete the training.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Then I am a Jedi?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Master Yoda... is Darth Vader my father?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Yoda, I must know.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Yes.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Unfortunate that I know the truth?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Well, I'm sorry.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I can't do it, Artoo. I can't go on alone.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Obi-Wan! Why didn't you tell me?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You told me Vader betrayed and murdered my father.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: There's still good in him.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I can't do it, Ben.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I tried to stop him once. I couldn't do it.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: But I had to help my friends.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I can't kill my own father.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Yoda spoke of another.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: But I have no sister.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Leia! Leia's my sister.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: But you can't let her get involved now, Ben. Vader will destroy her.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Well, look at you, a general, huh?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Well, who says they didn't. But I ain't crazy. You're the respectable one, remember?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Good luck.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You're gonna need it.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Sounds dangerous.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Uh, my team's ready. I don't have a command crew for the shuttle.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Well, it's gonna be rough, pal. I didn't want to speak for you.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Uh, General... count me in.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: What is it?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Luke.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hi, Han... Chewie.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: "Exciting" is hardly the word I would use.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Look. I want you to take her. I mean it. Take her. You need all the help you can get. She's the fastest ship in the fleet.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You, too.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You got her warmed?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Yeah, she's comin' up.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: No. I don't think the Empire had Wookiees in mind when they designed her, Chewie.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hey, are you awake?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Yeah, I just got a funny feeling. Like I'm not gonna see her again.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Right. Chewie, let's see what this piece of junk can do. Ready, everybody?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: All set.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Here we go again.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: All right, hang on.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: If they don't go for this, we're gonna have to get outta here pretty quick, Chewie.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Shuttle Tydirium requesting deactivation of the deflector shield.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Transmission commencing.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Now we find out if that code is worth the price we paid.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: It'll work. It'll work.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Vader's on that ship.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Now don't get jittery, Luke. There are a lot of command ships. Keep your distance though, Chewie, but don't look like you're trying to keep your distance.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I don't know. Fly casual.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm endangering the mission. I shouldn't have come.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: It's your imagination, kid. Come on. Let's keep a little optimism here.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: They're not goin' for it, Chewie.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Okay! I told you it was gonna work. No problem.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, I told you it was dangerous here.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Shall we try and go around?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: It'll take time. This whole party'll be for nothing if they see us.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Chewie and I will take care of this. You stay here.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Quietly, there might be more of them out there.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Over there! Two more of them!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I see them. Wait, Leia!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hey, wait! Ahhh!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Move closer!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Get alongside that one!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Get him!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, General Solo, somebody's coming. Oh!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Luke! Where's Leia?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I thought she was with you.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: We got separated.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hey, we better go look for her.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Take the squad ahead. We'll meet at the shield generator at 0300.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Come on, Artoo. We'll need your scanners.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Don't worry, Master Luke. We know what to do.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Cut it out!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm not gonna hurt you.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Well, looks like I'm stuck here. Trouble is, I don't know where here is.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Well, maybe you can help me. Come on, sit down.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I promise I won't hurt you. Now come here.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: All right. You want something to eat?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: That's right. Come on. Hmmm?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Look, it's a hat. It's not gonna hurt you. Look. You're a jittery little thing, aren't you?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: What is it?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Come on, let's get outta here.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Luke! Luke!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, Master Luke.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: There's two more wrecked speeders back there. And I found this.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm afraid that Artoo's sensors can find no trace of Princess Leia.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: What, Chewie? What? Chewie!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hey, I don't get it.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Chewie, wa-wait! Don't!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Nice work. Great, Chewie! Great! Always thinking with your stomach.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Will you take it easy? Let's just figure out a way to get out of this thing. Han, can you reach my lightsaber?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Yeah, sure.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Artoo, I'm not sure that's such a good idea. It's a very long dro-o- op!!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Wha--? Hey! Point that thing someplace else.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hey!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Han, don't. It'll be all right.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Chewie, give 'em your crossbow.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, my head. Oh, my goodness!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Do you understand anything they're saying?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, yes, Master Luke! Remember that I am fluent in over six million forms of communication.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: What are you telling them?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hello, I think... I could be mistaken. They're using a very primitive dialect. But I do believe they think I am some sort of god.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Well, why don't you use your divine influence and get us out of this?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I beg your pardon, General Solo, but that just wouldn't be proper.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Proper?!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: It's against my programming to impersonate a deity.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Why, you--

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: My mistake. He's an old friend of mine.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I have a really bad feeling about this.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: What did he say?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm rather embarrassed, General Solo, but it appears you are to be the main course at a banquet in my honor.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Your Royal Highness.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: But these are my friends. Threepio, tell them they must be set free.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Somehow, I got the feeling that didn't help us very much.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Threepio, tell them if they don't do as you wish, you'll become angry and use your magic.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: But Master Luke, what magic? I couldn't possibly --

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Just tell them.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You see, Master Luke; they didn't believe me. Just...

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: ... as I said they wouldn't. Wha-wha-what's happening! Oh! Oh, dear! Oh!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Put me down! He-e-elp! Master Luke! Artoo! Somebody, somebody, help! Master Luke, Artoo! Artoo, quickly! Do something, somebody! Oh! Ohhh!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, oh, oh, oh! Thank goodness.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Thanks, Threepio.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Yes, Artoo. I was just coming to that.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: What's going on?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I don't know.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Wonderful! We are now a part of the tribe.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Just what I always wanted.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: He says the scouts are going to show us the quickest way to the shield generator.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Good. How far is it? Ask him. We need some fresh supplies, too. And try and get our weapons back.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Luke, what's wrong?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Leia... do you remember your mother? Your real mother?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Just a little bit. She died when I was very young.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: What do you remember?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Just...images, really. Feelings.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Tell me.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: She was very beautiful. Kind, but...sad. Why are you asking me all this?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I have no memory of my mother. I never knew her.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Luke, tell me. What's troubling you?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Vader is here...now, on this moon.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I felt his presence. He's come for me. He can feel when I'm near. That's why I have to go. As long as I stay, I'm endangering the group and our mission here. I have to face him.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Why?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: He's my father.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Your father?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: There's more. It won't be easy for you to hear it, but you must. If I don't make it back, you're the only hope for the Alliance.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Luke, don't talk that way. You have a power I--I don't understand and could never have.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You're wrong, Leia. You have that power too. In time you'll learn to use it as I have. The Force is strong in my family. My father has it...I have it...and...my sister has it.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Yes. It's you Leia.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I know. Somehow...I've always known.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Then you know why I have to face him.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: No! Luke, run away, far away. If he can feel your presence, then leave this place. I wish I could go with you.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: No, you don't. You've always been strong.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: But, why must you confront him?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Because...there is good in him. I've felt it. He won't turn me over to the Emperor. I can save him. I can turn him back to the good side. I have to try.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hey, what's goin' on?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Nothing. I - just want to be alone for a little while.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I...I can't tell you.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Ahhh...

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm sorry.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hold me.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I know, father.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: It is the name of your true self. You've only forgotten. I know there is good in you. The Emperor hasn't driven it from you fully. That is why you couldn't destroy me. That's why you won't bring me to your Emperor now.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Come with me.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I will not turn...and you'll be forced to kill me.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Search your feelings, father. You can't do this. I feel the conflict within you. Let go of your hate.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Then my father is truly dead.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: The main entrance to the control bunker's on the far side of that landing platform. This isn't gonna be easy.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hey, don't worry. Chewie and me got into a lot of places more heavily guarded than this.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: What's he saying?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: He says there's a secret entrance on the other side of the ridge.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Back door, huh? Good idea.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Well, it only takes one to sound the alarm.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh! Oh, my. Uh, Princess Leia!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Quiet.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm afraid our furry companion has gone and done something rather rash.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, no.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Not bad for a little furball. There's only one left. You stay here. We'll take care of this.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I have decided that we shall stay here.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You're gravely mistaken. You won't convert me as you did my father.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You're wrong. Soon I'll be dead...and you with me.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Your overconfidence is your weakness.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: All right! Up! Move! Come on! Quickly! Quickly, Chewie.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Han! Hurry! The fleet will be here any moment.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Charges! Come on, come on!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Wa-wait! Wait, come back! Artoo, stay with me.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: No!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Hello! I say, over there! Were you looking for me?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Well, they're on their way. Artoo, are you sure this was a good idea?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: We surrender.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Ohhh! Stand back, Artoo.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: The code's changed. We need Artoo!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Here's the terminal.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Going? What do you mean, you're going. But-- but going where, Artoo? No, what! Artoo! Oh, this is no time for heroics. Come back!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: We're coming!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Come on! Come on!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, Artoo, hurry!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: My goodness! Artoo, why did you have to be so brave?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Well, I suppose I could hotwire this thing.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'll cover you.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I think I got it. I got it!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, Princess Leia, are you all right?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Let's see.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: It's not bad.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh, dear.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I love you.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I know.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Chewie! Get down here! She's wounded! No, wait.... I got an idea.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I will not fight you, father.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Your thoughts betray you, father. I feel the good in you...the conflict.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You couldn't bring yourself to kill me before, and I don't believe you'll destroy me now.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Throw me another charge.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I will not fight you.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Never-r-r!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Never! I'll never turn to the dark side. You've failed, Your Highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Move! Move!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: No. You're coming with me. I can't leave you here. I've got to save you.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You already have, Luke. You were right about me. Tell your sister...you were right.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Father...I won't leave you.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: They did it!

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: I'm sure Luke wasn't on that thing when it blew.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: He wasn't. I can feel it.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: You love him, don't you?

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Yes.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: All right. I understand. Fine. When he comes back, I won't get in the way.

title: Star-Wars-Return-of-the-Jedi
dialogue: Oh. No, it's not like that at all. He's my brother.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Echo Three to Echo Seven. Han, old buddy, do you read me?

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Loud and clear, kid. What's up?

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Well, I finished my circle. I don't pick up any life readings.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: There isn't enough life on this ice cube to fill a space cruiser. The sensors are placed, I'm going back.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Right. I'll see you shortly. There's a meteorite that hit the ground near here. I want to check it out. It won't take long.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Hey, steady girl. What's the matter? You smell something?

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Aaargh!

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Chewie!

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: All right, don't lose your temper. I'll come right back and give you a hand.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: No sign of life out there, General. The sensors are in place. You'll know if anything comes around.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: No. He's checking out a meteorite that hit near him.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: General, I've got to leave. I can't stay anymore.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Well, there's a price on my head. If I don't pay off Jabba the Hut, I'm a dead man.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Thank you, General.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Well, Your Highness, I guess this is it.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: That's right.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Well, don't get all mushy on me. So long, Princess.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Han!

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Yes, Your Highnessness?

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: I thought you decided to stay.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Well, the bounty hunter we ran into on Ord Mantell changed my mind.

title: Star-Wars-The-Empire-Strikes-Back
dialogue: Han, we need you!
